name: Booming Voice
baseDescription: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 1 rage point.

name: Cruelty
baseDescription: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.

name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
baseDescription: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 16%.

name: Unbridled Wrath
baseDescription: Gives you a 16% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

name: Improved Cleave
baseDescription: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by 120%.

name: Piercing Howl
baseDescription: Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

name: Blood Craze
baseDescription: Regenerates 2% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

name: Improved Battle Shout
baseDescription: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 5%.

name: Dual Wield Specialization
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 10%.

name: Improved Execute
baseDescription: Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 2.

name: Enrage
baseDescription: Gives you a 5% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

name: Improved Slam
baseDescription: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by 0.2 sec.

name: Death Wish
baseDescription: When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but lowers your armor and all resistances by 20%.  Lasts 30 sec.

name: Improved Intercept
baseDescription: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.

name: Improved Berserker Rage
baseDescription: The Berserker Rage ability will generate 5 rage when used.

name: Flurry
baseDescription: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

name: Bloodthirst
baseDescription: Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 45% of your attack power.  In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health.  This effect lasts 8 sec.
